word: H3365 - יָקַר - yâqar - yaw-kar' - Be precious

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - மதிக்கப்படு, அருமையாயிரு அருமையானவை, நீக்கு, கனம்பெறு, அருமையானது, அபூர்வமாக்கு
to esteem, to be prized, to be valuable, to be precious, to be costly, to be appraised
1) to be precious, to be highly - valued, to be esteemed, to be costly

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly apparently to be heavy, that is, (figuratively) valuable; causatively to make rare (figuratively to inhibit): - be (make) precious, be prized, be set by, withdraw.
Cognate: H3357, H3365, H3366, H3368
